summary: Updated AI Bot section with new Liquid Glass effect design. Changed from multi-layer structure to simpler ::before and ::after pseudo-elements approach. Updated SVG filter with new parameters (baseFrequency 0.001, scale 76). Applied new CSS styles with inner shadow (inset 0 0 41px -14px) and glass tint (rgba(255,255,255,0.04)). Simplified HTML structure by removing separate layer divs.
current_status: AI Bot section now uses the new Liquid Glass effect design with ::before and ::after pseudo-elements. SVG filter updated with new parameters. Ready for browser testing to verify the liquid glass effect works correctly.
